name: You
text: Nice to meet you. Im Tom, why are you in the dark?

name: Rose
text: I was in the bathroom then I got a little lost...Do you know why its dark?

name: You
text: Not quite sure. I've been hearing some interesting noises...I feel like im being watched

name: Rose
text: Ive been feeling a bit weird too...Anyways

name: Rose
text: I'm looking for my husband, his name is Roger...I think I got a bit lost after my bathroom visit

name: You
text: You said his name was Roger?

name: Rose
text: Yea! Have you seen him recently...The last time I saw him we were at TSA

name: You
text: Yea, I actually saw him a bit ago. He was in the TSA waiting area.

name: You
text: He was worried about missing the flight. Said he's been looking for you

name: Rose
text: I'm in the right place. He has my location, he'll figure it out

name: You
text: *Whispers* Guess you guys arent going to Bora Bora this year
